recipes.name: Chicken Katsu Curry
instructions: Heat oil in a pot, cook onion until translucent (2-3 min).
Add garlic, tomato paste, Worcestershire sauce, cook 1 min. Add curry powder, salt, sugar, cook 1 min.
Add potatoes, carrots, chicken stock. Simmer, cover, cook 20-25 min.
Butterfly chicken or pound to even thickness. Season with salt, pepper, and flour. Dip in egg, coat with panko.
Heat oil in a pan. Fry chicken 6 min each side until golden brown.
Make slurry with cornstarch and water. Thicken curry sauce, stir in butter. Adjust seasoning.
Serve sliced chicken over rice with curry sauce.

recipes.name: Chicken Adobo
instructions: Combine Chicken and Marinade ingredients, marinate 20+ min.
Heat 1 tbsp oil in skillet, sear chicken briefly (1 min/side).
Remove chicken, set aside.
Heat remaining oil, add garlic, onion, cook 1.5 min.
Add reserved marinade, water, sugar, pepper. Simmer 5 min.
Add chicken, simmer 20-25 min until sauce thickens.
If sauce is thin, simmer alone until thick. Coat chicken in glaze.
Serve over rice with optional sides.

recipes.name: Shrimp Fried Rice
instructions: Mix Sauce ingredients, set aside.
Heat 1 tbsp oil in wok over medium heat. Scramble eggs, remove.
Increase heat, cook bacon until golden (about 2 min), remove.
Drain excess bacon fat.
Add 2 tbsp oil, garlic, ginger. Return wok to high heat. Stir-fry, don't burn. When garlic sizzles, add onion, stir-fry 2 min until golden.
Add Chinese wine, sugar, simmer briefly (20 sec), mostly evaporate.
Add prawns/shrimp, stir-fry 1 min (or longer if raw).
Add rice, Sauce, eggs, bacon, most shallots/scallions. Stir-fry 2 min until hot.
Transfer to plate, sprinkle with remaining scallions. Serve.

recipes.name: BLT Sandwich
instructions: Cook the bacon
Toast the bread.
Slice the tomato.
Put all the ingredients between the two slices of toasted bread.
